channel.title: When you go into a crowded area, you cannot see your text on screen?
channel.description:
Hi,
On my server, when you go to a crowded place, when you type something, it appears in the text box, but it does not appear on the screen. It is annoying when it happens, because you have to keep looking at the text box.
Does anyone have a fix for this?
Thanks alot.
Musicmad441.

item.title: When you go into a crowded area, you cannot see your text on screen?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Isn’t it already set to 0 in player class?

Unless it is changed in client class, but i saw that on another server, but nowhere in client class was it increased nor decreased. ( headIcon = 1, headIcon = -1.)
